sentences.sContent: The card has a digital watermark detectable only by electronic cash dispensers.
sentences.sCn: 这种卡上带有只能被电子取款机识别的数码水印。

phrases.pCn: 嵌入水印；嵌入水印滤镜

words.tran: （美）流域；分水岭；集水区；转折点

trans.tranOther: a special design put onto paper, especially bank notes, that can only be seen when you hold it up to the light
